name: Muscle Car: Offroad Driving
description:
Muscle Car: Offroad Driving is based on true physics engine with cool controls and challenging game play options. The advanced V8 engine in all the cars gives you the ultimate joy of racing this muscle car. Enjoy racing on various deadly off road tracks on customized vehicles and feel the curves in this virtual car racing game
Features:

- Exciting and dynamic game play ensures you hours of fun
- Car damage is extremely realistic and feels like natural
- Very detailed muscle drift cars and dynamic reflection effect
- Various camera settings and camera options
- Front wheel drive and rear wheel driving controls
- Three different user controls for driving and simulation
